Perform dilution corrections

Source: R/correct-dilution.R
correct_dilution.Rd

Adjusts the EEM's and absorbance data fluorescence to account for dilutions performed prior to measurement.

Usage

correct_dilution(x)

Arguments

x

An eemlist or abslist object.

Value

An object of the same class as x (eemlist or abslist) with dilution corrections applied.

Details

The function uses the dilution factor provided in the metadata to correct the EEMs and absorbance values. Because of this, samples must already have metadata added using add_metadata().

Examples

eemlist <- add_metadata(metadata, example_eems)
correct_eem <- correct_dilution(eemlist)

abslist <- add_metadata(metadata, example_abs)
correct_abs <- correct_dilution(abslist)
